languages.text: "Размахивай Лексом в Империуме, законник. Здесь Простор, и приговоры выносят по праву сильного".
"You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman, but this is the Expanse. The mighty pass the sentences here."
languages.original_text: "Размахивай Лексом в Империуме, законник. Здесь Простор, и приговоры выносят по праву сильного".

traits.locale_text: "You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman. This is the Expanse, where the mighty pass the sentence."
"You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman. This is the Expanse, where the mighty pass the sentence."
"You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman, but this is the Expanse. The mighty pass the sentences here."
"You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman, but this is the Expanse. The mighty pass the sentences here."
"You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman, but this is the Expanse. The mighty pass the sentences here."
"You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman, but this is the Expanse. The mighty pass the sentences here."

languages.text: «Puedes hablar de tu Lex en el Imperium, jurista, pero esto es la Extensión. Aquí solo dictan sentencia los poderosos».
languages.original_text: "You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman, but this is the Expanse. The mighty pass the sentences here."

traits.locale_text: «Puedes hablar de tu Lex en el Imperium, jurista, pero esto es la Extensión. Aquí solo dictan sentencia los poderosos».

languages.text: “帝国法典你爱怎么翻就怎么翻，执法者。这里可是科罗努斯扩区，谁拳头大，谁就是法律。”
languages.original_text: "You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman, but this is the Expanse. The mighty pass the sentences here."

traits.locale_text: “帝国法典你爱怎么翻就怎么翻，执法者。这里可是科罗努斯扩区，谁拳头大，谁就是法律。”

languages.text: « Libre à vous de brandir l'épouvantail de votre sacro-sainte Lex au sein de l'Imperium, mais ici, nous sommes dans les Étendues. Seule compte la loi du plus fort. »
languages.original_text: "You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman, but this is the Expanse. The mighty pass the sentences here."

traits.locale_text: « Libre à vous de brandir l'épouvantail de votre sacro-sainte Lex au sein de l'Imperium, mais ici, nous sommes dans les Étendues. Seule compte la loi du plus fort. »

languages.text: 「法執行官、お前は帝国内でレックスを振ることができるが、これはエクスパンスである。権力者がここに判決を下す」
languages.original_text: "You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman, but this is the Expanse. The mighty pass the sentences here."

traits.locale_text: 「法執行官、お前は帝国内でレックスを振ることができるが、これはエクスパンスである。権力者がここに判決を下す」

languages.text: "O Lex'ini alıp İmparatorluk'ta istediğin gibi uygulayabilirsin kanuncu. Burası Enginlik. Burada güçlünün kanunu geçerlidir."
languages.original_text: "You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman, but this is the Expanse. The mighty pass the sentences here."

traits.locale_text: "O Lex'ini alıp İmparatorluk'ta istediğin gibi uygulayabilirsin kanuncu. Burası Enginlik. Burada güçlünün kanunu geçerlidir."

languages.text: "Mit Eurem Gesetz könnt Ihr innerhalb des Imperiums wedeln, aber das hier ist die Ausdehnung. Hier verkünden die Mächtigen das Urteil."
languages.original_text: "You can wave your Lex around in the Imperium, lawman, but this is the Expanse. The mighty pass the sentences here."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Eurem Gesetz könnt Ihr innerhalb des Imperiums wedeln, aber das hier ist die Ausdehnung. Hier verkünden die Mächtigen das Urteil."
